description: This 3 km loop visits about 80 huge, old White Pines and the site of an 1880s logging camp. The guide book, available at the trailhead, discusses how these magnificent trees came to be there, pine ecology, and the Park's logging history.  The huge pines are worth the trip.
directions: In Algonquin Provinvial Park at KM 40.3 of Highway 60.
title: Big Pines
